__11.__

a)
    Klassenmitten
    ```{r}
    c(
        (0 + 10) / 2,
        (10 + 20) / 2,
        (20 + 30) / 2,
        (30 + 50) / 2,
        (50 + 100) / 2
    )
    ```
    Klassenbreiten
    ```{r}
    c(
        (10 - 0),
        (20 - 10),
        (30 - 20),
        (50 - 30),
        (100 - 50)
    )
    ```
    Relative Klassenhäufigkeiten
    ```{r}
    absolute_occurences <- c(47.996, 191.492, 124.498, 104.428, 67.988, 31.125)
    n <- sum(absolute_occurences)

    absolute_occurences
    n

    absolute_occurences / n
    ```

b)
    Prozentsatz der Fälle < 30.000
    ```{r}
    sum(absolute_occurences[2:3]) / n
    ```
